lead_paragraph: The Republican candidate continues to defy his advisers’ efforts to get him to stick to his message, to the point that they believe he may be beyond coaching.

byline.original: By ALEXANDER BURNS and MAGGIE HABERMAN

headline.print_headline: The Failing Inside Mission to Tame Trump’s Tongue
headline.main: Inside the Failing Mission to Tame Donald Trump’s Tongue

snippet: The Republican candidate continues to defy his advisers’ efforts to get him to stick to his message, to the point that they believe he may be beyond coaching....
abstract: Efforts by Donald J Trump's campaign aides to rein in candidate's incendiary statements and shape his political message have failed, leading to falling poll numbers and loss of Republican support; mood of typically boastful and confident Trump appears at times to be souring, with Trump going so far as to admit that he might lose election.
